name: Specter Tenebria
description: A poisonous nightmare seeped in cruelty
story: While searching for a form that she liked, Tenebria enjoyed destroying people's minds. Her greatest joy came from watching them die from the poison of her illusions.
get_line: Now I shall force you into an eternal nightmare. Ahaha.

relations.description: His laughter always bothers Tenebria. Were they not on the same side, she would have gotten rid of him long ago.
Time and again, Tenebria's plans have been foiled by the Heir of the Covenant.
Tenebria wants to make Yuna her next target after she ruined her plans.
Tenebria cannot forgive Crozet for refusing her.
To Tenebria, the most annoying opponent is someone like Kise, who is unaffected by illusions.

specialty.name: Similar but Better
specialty.description: Sometimes fulfilling desires can result in great things.

type.name: Weakened
type.description: An unhealthy mind poisons the soul.

skills.name: Poison Blast
skills.description: Attacks with an explosion of poison energy, with a {{variable}} chance to inflict poison for 2 turns. This skill cannot trigger a counterattack. Attacks two enemies when Endless Nightmare is in cooldown.

skills.name: Nightmare Illusion
skills.description: When an ally capable of being attacked is still remaining, the caster cannot be selected as a target for attacks. Increases Attack and Defense of the caster by {{variable}} every time somebody dies. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.

skills.name: Endless Nightmare
skills.description: Attacks with a nightmare crystal, stunning for 1 turn. Decreases the Combat Readiness of all remaining enemies by 50% when an enemy dies.
skills.enhanced_description: Attacks with a nightmare crystal, stunning for 1 turn. Decreases the Combat Readiness of all remaining enemies by 50% when an enemy dies. Damage dealt increases proportional to the number of debuffs inflicted on the enemy.

debuffs.name: Stun
debuffs.effect: The target becomes unable to act for a certain number of turns.

debuffs.name: Poison
debuffs.effect: Receives damage equivalent to 5% of max Health at the start of the turn.

skill1.name: 猛毒破
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、50.0%の確率で毒を2ターンの間付与する。この攻撃は反撃されない。【終わり無き悪夢】のスキルターンが0でない場合、敵単体でなく、対象を含む敵2体に攻撃する。
skill1.soul_description: 追加ターンが発生する。

skill2.name: 悪夢の幻影
skill2.desc: 相手の攻撃対象になれる味方が存在するかぎり、自身は相手の攻撃対象に指定されない。敵・味方が気絶するたび、自身の攻撃力・防御力が7.0%UPする。最大5回まで累積する。

skill3.name: 終わり無き悪夢
skill3.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、スタンを1ターンの間付与する。このスキルで敵を気絶させた場合、他のすべての敵のアクションゲージを50%DOWNさせる。
